definitions.definition: the dried leaves of the tobacco plant that are used for making cigarettes, smoking in a pipe, etc.

examples.text: The government imposed a ban on tobacco advertising *(= the advertising of cigarettes and all other forms of ).
Several different tobaccos are grown on the land.

wordOrigin: mid 16th cent.: from Spanish tabaco; said to be from a Carib word denoting a tobacco pipe or from a Taino word for a primitive cigar, but perhaps from Arabic.
